name: Stonehenge
description: A prehistoric monument consisting of a ring of standing stones in England.
history: Stonehenge was built around 3000 BC in the late Neolithic period, serving as a ceremonial or astronomical site.

name: Machu Picchu
description: An ancient Inca citadel in the Andes Mountains of Peru.
history: Machu Picchu was built in the 15th century as a royal estate and religious retreat for the Inca emperor Pachacuti.

name: Pyramids of Giza
description: The Great Pyramid and its complex in Egypt.
history: The pyramids were built as tombs for the pharaohs around 2580â€“2565 BC during the Fourth Dynasty.
